name: mysql
description: MySQL Server is a widely used open-source relational database management system. It's the backbone for many applications, offering full data control for self-hosted and enterprise database workloads.
features: ACID compliance: Ensure data integrity with atomic transactions, consistency, isolation, and durability guarantees.
Replication: Set up master-slave or master-master replication for high availability and read scaling.
Stored procedures: Create reusable database logic with procedures, functions, and triggers for complex operations.
Full-text search: Index and search text content efficiently using built-in full-text indexing capabilities.
Partitioning: Divide large tables into smaller pieces for improved query performance and maintenance.
JSON support: Store and query JSON documents natively with specialized functions and indexing options.
Performance tuning: Optimize queries with explain plans, indexes, and query cache for faster data access.
Backup tools: Use mysqldump, binary logs, and point-in-time recovery for comprehensive data protection.
